text:
<<ccode"" "server {
    listen 80;
    server_name yourdomain.com;

    location / {
        proxy_pass http://localhost:8080;  # Bob server running on 8080
        auth_basic "Restricted Content";
        auth_basic_user_file /etc/nginx/.htpasswd;
    }
}
" "ngnix config para wiki">>
title: nginx config
